title: How to Use the Planet Fitness Massage Chairs

steps.title: The massage chair is a machine that simulates a massage.
steps.content: The massage chair is a machine that simulates a massage. The massage chair is a reclining chair that has mechanized balls and rollers built inside the back, seat, and leg rest. The rollers move in circles to knead the muscles along your neck, shoulders, back, rear, and legs. This is meant to replicate the hand techniques of a massage therapist. [1] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source The massage chair is thought to have the same benefits as getting a massage, such as reducing muscle stiffness and relieving stress. [2] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Ask an employee at the front desk to use a massage chair.
steps.content: Ask an employee at the front desk to use a massage chair. Talk to a Planet Fitness employee at the front desk to book a massage chair. If the chairs are all currently in use, the employee will schedule an appointment for you when one is free. Just check in with the front desk when your massage is scheduled. Some locations have a self-service kiosk or computer to book a massage chair, which the employee will direct you to. Note : You have to be a Black Card member to use the massage chairs at Planet Fitness. The Black Card membership costs $24.99 per month. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to your assigned chair and sit in the seat to start the massage.
steps.content: Go to your assigned chair and sit in the seat to start the massage. Make your way to the Black Card Spa to find the massage chairs—they may be in a separate, labeled room or in an open area. [4] X Research source The chairs are typically numbered, so simply sit in the one that the Planet Fitness employee assigned to you. Some massage chairs automatically start after 1 minute. At other locations, you press a button on the wall to activate the chair and tap “Start” on the remote or armrest. You might need to use a key tag to get into the massage chair area. If you’re not sure where to find the massage chairs or how to start them, ask an employee for help at the front desk.

steps.title: Use the remote or armrest panel to customize your massage.
steps.content: Use the remote or armrest panel to customize your massage. Most newer massage chairs have a phone-like remote that you use to control the chair, while older chairs typically have a control panel built into the armrest. Both devices have several options to control the intensity of your massage: [5] X Research source Back intensity : Use the “+” and “-” buttons to adjust the kneading along your back. Airbag/Leg intensity : Use the “+” and “-” buttons to adjust the kneading and pressure along your calves. Massage mode/program : On newer chairs, you have options for a Normal, Back Only, or Heavy massage. On older chairs, you have options for Kneading/Light Tapping (gentle), Kneading/Tapping (moderate), or Kneading/Knocking (intense). On newer chairs, you may have the option to adjust how far the chair reclines.

steps.title: Wipe down the chair when your massage is over.
steps.content: Wipe down the chair when your massage is over. Most massage chairs run for 5 to 10 minutes. Once the massage is complete, use the provided sanitizing spray to spray down the chair. Then, wipe the spray onto the chair with a cloth or paper towel. If you want to use the massage chair for longer, simply go to the front desk and schedule another appointment. If the gym isn’t busy, the employee might let you book several appointments back-to-back.

steps.title: The massage chair has similar benefits to massage therapy.
steps.content: The massage chair has similar benefits to massage therapy. Massage therapy is an ancient and well-researched healing procedure that has many benefits. For instance, it can: Reduce muscle pain and tightness . The kneading motion helps loosen knots in your muscles, which relieves tension, stiffness, and pain. [6] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Promote relaxation and relieve stress . Massages release endorphins, which calm you and make you feel good. They also reduce the production of stress hormones like cortisol and adrenaline. [7] X Research source Stimulate blood circulation . Applying pressure to your muscles increases blood flow, which can help reduce inflammation, soreness, and pain. [8] X Research source Increase flexibility . Massages help relieve muscle tightness and tension, which can improve your range of motion. [9] X Research source Improve recovery between workouts . Because a massage can reduce muscle soreness, improve blood circulation, and increase flexibility, it is a great post-workout activity. [10] X Research source Boost your immune system . Getting regular massages can increase your white blood cells, which help fight off viruses, diseases, and infections. [11] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Improve sleep quality . The serotonin and dopamine you release when you get a massage can also help you sleep better. [12] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Increase lymphatic fluid flow . Massages can move lymphatic fluid through your body to reduce swelling and inflammation. [13] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Relieves symptoms for some diseases . Getting regular massages can reduce pain and increase general well-being for people with cancer. [14] X Research source It can also relieve symptoms for people who have chronic diseases like fibromyalgia, heart disease, and arthritis. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Use the massage chair after or before your workout.
steps.content: Use the massage chair after or before your workout. Most gym goers like to use the massage chair after they exercise to soothe their muscles, promote recovery, and unwind after an intense workout session. [16] X Research source Other people like to use the massage chair before their workout to warm up, strengthen, and stretch their muscles. [17] X Research source There’s no wrong time to use the massage chair! It’s also perfectly okay to go to the gym just for some R&R time.

steps.title: The HydroMassage uses water to simulate a massage.
steps.content: The HydroMassage uses water to simulate a massage. The Black Card membership at Planet Fitness also gives you access to the HydroMassage beds. The beds are similar to the massage chairs, except they have water jets built inside the fabric that shoot jets of water along your back and legs. The water pressure mimics the movements of a traditional massage to help release muscle tension and improve relaxation. [18] X Research source Because the water jets are inside the HydroMassage bed, you stay dry during the massage! To use the HydroMassage , simply ask an employee at the front desk to set up an appointment. Most massages last 10 minutes. The HydroMassage has similar benefits to using the massage chairs at Planet Fitness. It can also speed up muscle recovery, stimulate blood flow, and improve flexibility.

steps.title: Do you have to pay to use the massage chairs at Planet Fitness?
steps.content: Do you have to pay to use the massage chairs at Planet Fitness? No, you do not have to pay extra to use the massage chairs if you have a Black Card membership. They are included with your card.

steps.title: How many times can you use the massage chairs at Planet Fitness?
steps.content: How many times can you use the massage chairs at Planet Fitness? You can use the massage chairs an unlimited amount of times with your Black Card membership. There’s no limit on how many times you can use the chairs per day, week, month, or year.

steps.title: How long can you use a Planet Fitness massage chair for?
steps.content: How long can you use a Planet Fitness massage chair for? At most locations, the massage chairs run for 5 to 10 minutes. If your gym isn’t busy, the front desk employee might be able to schedule several appointments back-to-back so you get a longer massage.

steps.title: Can Planet Fitness guests use the massage chairs?
steps.content: Can Planet Fitness guests use the massage chairs? Per Planet Fitness’ policy, guests do not have access to the Black Card Spa, so they can’t use the massage chairs. [19] X Research source Guests are only allowed to use the base gym equipment.
